attributes.action: Remove sections 132-134 of the Serious Organised Crime and Police Act to stop yourself looking like a hypocrite.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst the Government is condemning the actions of the Burmese Dictatorship with regards to protests it deems 'illegal' they persist in preventing British citizens from protesting outside the Houses of Parliament using s132 of SOCPA. Citizens of our 'democracy' have been arrested and charged with various crimes for simply expressing their opinion in the vicinity of our seat of Government. Stop this hypocrisy and allow true democracy back to Britain before denouncing others.
